tasks.label: Run the single flaky UI test with extended waits
tasks.command: xcodebuild -project "Future - Life Updates.xcodeproj" -scheme "Future - Life Updates" -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' -only-testing "Future___Life_UpdatesUITests/testReminderTimeDisplaysAfterAdding" test | xcbeautify

tasks.label: List Xcode schemes to validate names
Run single UI test using test target as destination hint
tasks.command: xcodebuild -project "Future - Life Updates.xcodeproj" -scheme "Future - Life Updates" -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15,OS=latest' -only-testing "Future - Life UpdatesUITests/testReminderTimeDisplaysAfterAdding" test

tasks.label: Build app (iOS Simulator)

tasks.command: xcodebuild -project "Future - Life Updates.xcodeproj" -scheme "Future - Life Updates" -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15,OS=latest' clean build
